SELECT COUNT(EMPLYR_ID) as cnt FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO b ON a.ORGNZT_ID = b.ORGNZT_ID WHERE 1=1
AND NVL(b.ORGNZT_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
AND NVL(a.USER_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
SELECT OFCPS_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = #{wrterId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T0.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (
SELECT A.REPRT_ID, A.REPRT_SJ, A.REPORT_DE, NVL(B.USER_NM, C.MBER_NM) WRTER_NM, (CASE WHEN NVL(A.DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT, ' ') = ' ' THEN '미등록' ELSE '등록' END) DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT, (CASE WHEN NVL(A.REPORTR_INQIRE_DT, ' ') = ' ' THEN '미확인' ELSE '확인' END) REPORTR_INQIRE_DT FROM COMTNMEMOREPRT A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.WRTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER C ON A.WRTER_ID = C.ESNTL_ID WHERE (A.WRTER_ID = #{searchId} OR A.REPORTR_ID = #{searchId})
AND A.REPORT_DE BETWEEN #{searchBgnDe} AND #{searchEndDe}
AND A.REPRT_SJ LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
AND A.REPORT_CN LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
AND B.USER_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
AND NVL(A.DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT, ' ') = ' '
AND NVL(A.DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT, ' ') != ' '
AND NVL(A.REPORTR_INQIRE_DT, ' ') = ' '
AND NVL(A.REPORTR_INQIRE_DT, ' ') != ' '
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
) T0 ) Z WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{firstIndex} + 1 AND #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(A.REPRT_ID) as cnt FROM COMTNMEMOREPRT A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.WRTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID WHERE (A.WRTER_ID = #{searchId} OR A.REPORTR_ID = #{searchId})
AND A.REPORT_DE BETWEEN #{searchBgnDe} AND #{searchEndDe}
AND A.REPRT_SJ LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
AND A.REPORT_CN LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
AND B.USER_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
AND NVL(A.DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT, ' ') = ' '
AND NVL(A.DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT, ' ') != ' '
AND NVL(A.REPORTR_INQIRE_DT, ' ') = ' '
AND NVL(A.REPORTR_INQIRE_DT, ' ') != ' '

SELECT A.REPRT_ID, A.REPRT_SJ, A.REPORT_DE, A.WRTER_ID, NVL(B.USER_NM, D.MBER_NM) WRTER_NM, B.OFCPS_NM WRTER_CLSF_NM, A.REPORTR_ID, NVL(C.USER_NM, E.MBER_NM) REPORTR_NM, C.OFCPS_NM REPORTR_CLSF_NM, A.REPORT_CN, A.ATCH_FILE_ID, A.DRCT_MATTER, A.DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT, A.REPORTR_INQIRE_DT, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNMEMOREPRT A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO B ON A.WRTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO C ON A.REPORTR_ID = C.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER D ON A.WRTER_ID = D.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNGNRLMBER E ON A.REPORTR_ID = E.ESNTL_ID WHERE A.REPRT_ID = #{reprtId}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNMEMOREPRT SET REPRT_SJ=#{reprtSj}, REPORT_DE=#{reprtDe}, WRTER_ID=#{wrterId}, REPORTR_ID=#{reportrId}, REPORT_CN=#{reprtCn}, ATCH_FILE_ID=#{atchFileId}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATETIME, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE REPRT_ID = #{reprtId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNMEMOREPRT ( REPRT_ID, REPRT_SJ, REPORT_DE, WRTER_ID, REPORTR_ID, REPORT_CN, ATCH_FILE_ID, DRCT_MATTER, DRCT_MATTER_REGIST_DT, REPORTR_INQIRE_DT, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #{reprtId}, #{reprtSj}, #{reprtDe}, #{wrterId}, #{reportrId}, #{reprtCn}, #{atchFileId}, '', '', '', SYSDATETIME, #{frstRegisterId}, SYSDATETIME, #{lastUpdusrId} )
